readable.title: 2968135512_51fbb56e3e
readable.content: A boy in a white t-shirt does skateboard tricks . A boy in t-shirt , jeans and knit cap jumps up with his skating board , arms flung out . A man performs a skateboarding trick on a cement monument in a city park . A skateboarder is airborne in a city green space . Young skateboarder doing a trick in the park .
